name: Siralim 3
description: Siralim 3 is a mechanically deep, monster taming RPG. Summon and customize over 700 different creatures to fight for you as you battle your way through randomly generated dungeons. Find rare treasure and use it to craft new items, empower your creatures, learn new spells, and much more.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Storage: 200 MB available space
